doc.field: Records of the Office of the President (John Brademas)
Records of the Office of the President (John Brademas)

This series includes reports, speeches, correspondence, budgets, and annual reports collected by the Office of the President on individual NYU Schools and Divisions. Groups with the largest amount of material include the College of Arts and Sciences; College of Dentistry; Medical Center; Tisch School of the Arts; College and Graduate School of Business Administration; School of Education, Health, Nursing, and Arts Professions; Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences; School of Law; School of Continuing Education; and Institute of Fine Arts. This series also contains files on NYU in Spain; the Gallatin Division; La Maison Fran√ßaise; Onassis Center for Hellenic Studies; and Deutsches Haus. Admissions reports on individual schools and the university date from 1977 to 1983. Meeting files for the Boards for the Medical Center, School of Arts and Science, and Law School Board are also in this series.
Records of the Office of the President (John Brademas)
